amendment.description: To strengthen national security by adding an additional 275 Customs and Border Protection officers at United States ports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4931 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 242.

action.text: Amendment SA 4931 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S9339-9341, S9348; text: CR S9339-9340) To strengthen national security by adding an additional 275 Customs and Border Protection officers at United States ports.
